title: Skin Cleansing System Facial Brush & Body Care Kit for Women & Men. Includes 4 different heads - Large Body Brush, Soft Face Brush, Regular Face Brush and Pumice Stone. Water-Resistant.
description: Now you can enjoy the rejuvenating spa and dermatologist experiences at home- at a fraction of the cost. This Professional Skin Care System by ToiletTree Products is and advanced daily cleansing tool that helps polish away dull skin and gently exfoliates away impurities that traditional cleansing leaves behind. The result? Wonderfully cleaner, softer, radiant looking skin.The professional Skin Care System, along with a daily cleaning regimen, helps assist the following:-Stimulates skin renewal-Improves overall skin clarity and appearance.-Removes dead skin cells to expose healthier-looking skin-Energizes skin and leaves it sooth, soft and radiant.-Cleans deep to help remove stubborn makeup.-Enhances absorption of moisturizes.System includes: 2 face exfoliater (1 soft for sensitive skin types & 1 medium for normal skin types), 1 body exfoliater and 1 pumice sphere.Refills are also available.

title: Jan Marini Benzoyl Peroxide 2.5%-8 oz
description: Jan Marini Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment Wash 2.5% - therapeutical anti-bacterial treatment for people who suffer from acne and acne prone skin. Benzoyl Peroxide, proven by the American Academy of Dermatology, significantly reduces P acne bacteria (the bacteria believed to play a primary role in the inflammation of the acne process). This delicate wash removes sebum and cellular debris without irritation to the skin. Individuals with oily skin will appreciate the result of clean, soft, and smooth skin. Directions: Apply a small amount to face. Work into lather. Remove with washcloth and rinse thoroughly. Jan Marini Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment Wash 2.5%Ingredients: Deionized water, Sorbitol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Propylene Glycol, Germaben II, Glycerine, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Disodium EDTA.

title: Acne.org 8 oz. Treatment (2.5% Benzoyl Peroxide)
description: This 2.5% benzoyl peroxide is gel-based so it goes on clear and spreads easily. It is pharmaceutical grade, pH balanced, fragrance-free, and dye-free. It won't "clump up" with moisturizers, and won't turn white when you perspire. This treatment works best when used as part of The Regimen (acne.org/regimen), a step-by-step guide to clear skin.
